channel.title: Blues Aganist Niggers
channel.description:
[size=6pt][u]DISCLAIMER [Davidi2] - Don't listen if you find semi-racist humor to be offensive[/u][/size]
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/934145/Musix/BAN.mp3
Largely unfinished because i was interrupted, and the solo was improvised and never finished, and therefore is horrible.
The lyrical content is quite nice though!

item.title: Blues Aganist Niggers
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:50, topic:419005”][quote author=SETO link=topic=521534.msg3791722#msg3791722 date=1319338516]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=521534.msg3790242#msg3790242 date=1319238782]

^ Nobody cares tbh.

Speljohan, did you do the guitar yourself or use a music studio program/another song?

I care? Also, things like this are considered criminal offenses in most if not all countries around the world.
Naive children… Why am I wasting my time on yous…? I’m wondering why nobody has been reprimanded for this yet. Time to refer it to another member of staff.
[/quote]Read the rules.

You don’t need to listen to something you find offensive, and I think the title should be warning enough for anyone that may find this sort of stuff offensive. It seems like he’s mostly just showing it off and trying to be humorous on the process, I see nothing wrong with that. But I’ve put a disclaimer in the post in case anyone else may find it offensive.

i know why you aren’t taking out the ban hammer or the mute hammer, cause spel is at the top of the chain (scared), btw nice!
[/quote]I don’t know what is up with the notion that we have some sort of organized underground system. The truth is that nobody gives a flying love and there is no “chain of command”.[/quote]
Don’t listen to him there is and I am at the peak of it.

Seriously, if you don’t like the name as it is, don’t post… can’t take a little racism? Well then gl m8 cos u gon get hooked in the gabber m8
u wot m8

Read full topic

item.title: Blues Aganist Niggers
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:39, topic:419005”]Everyone is racist, we all make judgements on race which is racism:L.

e.g. A black man is referred to as a gambo here, whenever I see someone that looks like a drug dealer i go check that gambo or something along those lines but if it was a white person i’d be like drug addict. Race does play a part in what decisions we make on things, just some people can’t see that.

Oh also, I’m very different to what you people would think I am from this conversation.
@jump i said i say racist remarks?[/quote]You keep saying everyone is a racist and I don’t think that is true. What I do think however is that your projecting your own feelings about being a racist yourself. You also apparently do not know the definition of a racist.

Read full topic

item.title: Blues Aganist Niggers
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:30, topic:419005”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=521534.msg3790309#msg3790309 date=1319240912]

[quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=521534.msg3790286#msg3790286 date=1319240366]

k, i give up. naive, just so naive.
since we’re in the mood of promoting racial hate and pretending its a joke

nah but seriously, david if you want to discuss this skype me because i’m not wasting time typing this to you because its such a large topic… i have a perfect rebuttal for anything you say on this, oh and funny how you censor HF but not racism and k say its a joke.
naivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaivenaive + socialy irresponsible
I will not be commenting on this again due to the lack of logical argument that isn’t shortsighted
[/quote]I didn’t listen to the OP song OR yours, because I figured I probably wouldn’t like the lyrics. What’s your issue, can’t you decide for yourself what you’re going to listen to or not? That’s like requesting that nobody listen to rap because you don’t like some of the messages…

okay i lied, i’m commenting again just because the ignorance of what you said annoys me. People mentally abled in homes etc are looked after by carers who make decisions for them right? mothers make decisions for there children right? Same situation, I’m obliged to help the mentally less abled(90% of this community at least from what I can tell) to not allow them to have a decaying mental well being. By casually listening to racism as a ‘joke’ the assumption is automatically made it is fine to do so overtime. This will evolve into racism. When racism exists psychical attacks may happen. Racism will then harm society by dividing and also cause psychical and emotional pain. There are so many, like oh so many points I can make but I don’t want to type them.
I should’ve given up this is like trying to teach science to hillbillies.
[/quote]I don’t want to get into a ‘humor influences society’ vs ‘society influences humor’ debate here, if we took all that seriously we’d have a no humor rule, and nobody wants that. It’s not yours or my place to be the ‘parent’ of Moparscape, so I gave a disclaimer at the top of the post and I’ll let people make the choice themselves.

lolololololol neglect a completely viable point then;). I have so many completely different points I could make on this.
Your also supporting someone who is directly and knowingly breaking the law. Don’t you feel proud of yourself?
This topic has a lot of controversy which is obvious but I can tell most of the people who want this topic to stay up will be American I wonder why;). Funny how African american’s were the one picked on and this was most likely posted by an American. Coincidence or inbuilt unknown racism?[/quote]1. I’m Swedish.
2. Racism is not aganist the law (here). Freedom of speech goes above everything else. It’s a concious choice if you want to listen.
3. If you look at one of my earlier posts i believe it’s quite obvious that the entire thing is sarcastic and a way to poke fun at rednecks.

Read full topic

item.title: Blues Aganist Niggers
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:28, topic:419005”]Actually listened to that one, did you write the lyrics beforehand or just adlib :L[/quote]It’s all improvised.

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:6, topic:419033”]Try playing a guitar rift and then recording another one on top of it.

The first one will be the layout and pretty simple and then get a little more into it with the second one.

@david he made it up :D[/quote]I already do that for some stuff, but primarily for my more serious efforts such as these:
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/934145/Music/heavymetal.mp3
